item.title: Deploying an Express App to Heroku
item.description: Some coworkers expressed interest in deploying Express apps to Heroku. These instructions seek to provide a basic overview, though Heroku offers much more robust documentation in its dev center. Step 1: Create a Heroku account. Step 2: Install the Heroku Toolbelt, which includes the Heroku command line client, Git, and Foreman. Step 3: Log in by entering the following in the command line: heroku login Step 4: Install Node.js. Step 5: Create an Express app.
